mapper.select: select no, u_name, u_id, u_tel, u_addr, nvl2(u_status,u_status,'활동')u_status from ( select p.*, rank() over(order by u_idx) no from(select * from user_market where u_grade='일반회원')p ) where no between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from user_market where u_grade='일반회원'
select count(*) from user_market where u_id=#{u_id} and u_mail=#{u_mail}
select * from user_market where u_pwd=#{u_pwd} and u_idx=#{u_idx}
select u_id from user_market where u_name=#{u_name} and u_tel=#{u_tel}
select to_char(u_regdate,'mm') as u_month, count(*) as u_tot from user_market where to_char(u_regdate,'yy')=to_char(sysdate,'yy') group by to_char(u_regdate,'mm') order by to_char(u_regdate,'mm') asc
mapper.insert: insert into user_market values( (select nvl(max(u_idx)+1,1)from user_market), #{u_id}, #{u_pwd}, #{u_name}, #{u_nickname}, #{u_birth}, #{u_addr}, sysdate, 0, '안녕하세요', 'no_file', #{u_tel}, #{u_mail}, '일반회원', #{u_ip}, #{postcode}, '활동', 0 )
mapper.update: update user_market set u_name=#{u_name}, u_id=#{u_id}, u_pwd=#{u_pwd}, u_zipcode=#{u_zipcode}, u_addr=#{u_addr) where u_idx=#{u_idx}
update user_market set u_pwd=#{u_pwd} where u_mail=#{u_mail}
mapper.select: select count(*) from user_market where to_char(u_regdate,'dd') = to_char(sysdate, 'dd')
